dotnetType.name: TimestampSchemaBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TimestampResolution" />.

overloads.summary: Creates a new timestamp schema builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.StringSchema" /> build result if <paramref name="resolution" />
            is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.TimestampResolution" />; an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" />
            build result otherwise.

overloads.summary:
Whether the case should build string schemas (ISO 8601) or long schemas (timestamp
            logical types).

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TimestampSchemaBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Abstract.SchemaBuilderCase
